202  class slightmatrix_error: public exception {};
203 
206  class slightmatrix_parameter_error: public slightmatrix_error {
207  const char* what() const throw() {
208  return "Invalid parameter.";
209  }
210  };
211 
214  class slightmatrix_column_error: public slightmatrix_error {
215  const char* what() const throw() {
216  return "Invalid column count or index.";
217  }
218  };
219 
222  class slightmatrix_row_error: public slightmatrix_error {
223  const char* what() const throw() {
224  return "Invalid row count or index.";
225  }
226  };
227 
231  class slightmatrix_matrix_error: public slightmatrix_error {
232  const char* what() const throw() {
233  return "Invalid matrix (rows incomplete or column count not set).";
234  }
235  };
